backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining story, user, and draft types with storage and authorization mixins plus a dummy stories list and map-based state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH channel values.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, theme colors, and loading the React app root.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, categories, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, messaging, and fetch handlers with caching strategies for app shell and assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component setting up routing, theme, splash screen, and global providers, with logic for drawer, onboarding, scroll reset, and service worker.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Renders a basic ad container unless user is premium or in preview, offering a button to navigate to the premium page with error logging.
frontend/src/components/AppButton.tsx: Wrapper around shadcn Button enforcing consistent styling across variants and sizes to prevent CSS regressions.
frontend/src/components/AppDrawer.tsx: Slide‑in navigation drawer listing main app routes, premium CTA, and error‑handled navigation with fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top header with menu button, centered logo with fallback, and user avatar pulled from profile data.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Bottom navigation bar with route buttons, highlighting the active tab and handling navigation failures.
frontend/src/components/ButtonStyleRegre: Dev‑only floating panel rendering multiple button variants for quick visual verification of styling.
frontend/src/components/CategoryScroller: Horizontal category scroller that navigates to encoded category pages, filtered by preferences and kids mode.
frontend/src/components/ContinueReadingC: Shows the user's last-read story with cover, progress, and click-to-continue navigation.
frontend/src/components/DailyStoryNotifi: Displays a dismissible daily story banner that hides for 24 hours once dismissed.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Prompts users to install the PWA when installable, with install and dismiss actions.
frontend/src/components/InterstitialAdMo: Shows an interstitial ad modal with a countdown unless the user is premium or in preview mode.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dropdown for selecting the app's UI language.
frontend/src/components/LegalSupportPage: Page layout with a back button, styled content container, and footer for legal/support pages.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity and updates query cache accordingly.
frontend/src/components/ModeToggle.tsx: Switches between adults and kids viewing modes.
frontend/src/components/MyStoryCard.tsx: Displays a user's story with cover, metadata, and buttons to edit or read.
frontend/src/components/MyStoryDraftCard: Shows a draft story preview with image (if any) and relative creation time.
Debug overlay listing navigation failures with options to clear or close.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Controls a 3-step onboarding wizard that updates language, age mode, and theme, with forward/back navigation, skip handling, and transition animations.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/StepT: Provides direction-based enter animations for onboarding steps, with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Generic page layout wrapper providing spacing and optional title.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Renders a premium badge with different visual variants using icons and gradient styles.
Provides a popover with controls for font size, background color, and auto‑scroll settings.
frontend/src/components/ReminderBanner.t: Shows a dismissible reminder banner based on stored display logic.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Guards content behind authentication and prompts users to log in if not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/RouteErrorFallba: Displays a styled 404/error fallback with diagnostics logging and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/ShareSheetPlaceh: Handles story sharing via Web Share API or clipboard fallback with success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows the app splash screen with animated logo, taglines, and a loading indicator.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story preview card with navigation, favorites, likes, and basic story metadata.
frontend/src/components/StoryCardSkeleto: Provides a skeleton placeholder layout for loading story cards.
frontend/src/components/TopBanner.tsx: Renders a dismissible top banner with variants and optional icon and description.
Shows a banner offering translation and displays a placeholder message after translating.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Displays a user avatar with fallback initials, error handling, and optional loading overlay.
Manages user preference state (language, mode, font settings, etc.) with localStorage persistence and backend sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, automatically refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUser.ts: Handles user profile state for both authenticated and guest users, syncing with backend and supporting optimistic premium updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavorites.ts: Provides fetching and toggling of favorite stories, supporting both authenticated backend storage and guest localStorage mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, storage, identity restoration, and state tracking via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyStories.ts: Fetches user's story drafts from backend or localStorage, filtering expired entries and sorting by newest first.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDownloads.t: Manages offline story downloads using localStorage, converting bigint fields and tracking downloaded story IDs.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates on changes via matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt readiness, dismissal logic, and showing the installation dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useReadingHistory.ts: Tracks story reading history for guests or authenticated users, storing progress and last-read entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch stories, categories, and featured items from backend with seeded fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoryEditor.ts: Creates new stories or drafts, uploading images if authenticated or saving locally for guests.
frontend/src/hooks/useStorySocial.ts: Manages likes and comments for a story using local storage-backed social data.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Retrieves and updates user profiles for authenticated or guest users, handling image blobs and fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color themes, dark mode variables, focus states, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/covers.ts: Returns cover image URLs based on category and kid-friendly mode, with fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/engagement.ts: Manages engagement data including streaks, badges, shares, and persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/fonts.ts: Maps UI languages to CSS font classes with a default fallback.
frontend/src/lib/i18n.ts: Defines supported UI languages and localized UI strings for each language.
frontend/src/lib/kidsMode.ts: Provides kids-safe category filtering and defines mature and kid-friendly category lists.
frontend/src/lib/logOnce.ts: Logs warnings or errors only once per session keyed by identifier.
frontend/src/lib/navFailures.ts: Tracks recent navigation failures in sessionStorage with helpers to record, retrieve, and clear them.
frontend/src/lib/notifications.ts: Wraps browser notification permissions and shows a test notification when allowed.
frontend/src/lib/onboarding.ts: Stores and retrieves onboarding completion state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/profileValidation.ts: Validates usernames and image files/URLs for profile input.
frontend/src/lib/readingProgress.ts: Saves, loads, and clears per-story reading progress in localStorage and computes scroll percentage.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Handles reminder settings, checks if reminders should show, and records last shown time.
frontend/src/lib/routerSearch.ts: Safely converts search objects to query strings and builds full paths with search parameters.
frontend/src/lib/seededStories.ts: Provides seeded fallback stories, cover image selection, and kids-mode filtering.
frontend/src/lib/share.ts: Provides sharing utilities for app and stories using Web Share API with clipboard fallback and structured result types.
frontend/src/lib/storyDraft.ts: Validates story form inputs, computes word counts and read time, and manages locally stored story tags.
frontend/src/lib/storyLanguage.ts: Maps UI languages to backend languages and retrieves story content or translation availability accordingly.
frontend/src/lib/storySocialStorage.ts: Handles localStorage-based likes overlays and comments for individual stories.
frontend/src/lib/translatePlaceholder.ts: Generates placeholder translated story content using English as a fallback.
frontend/src/lib/uiPolish.ts: Defines shared UI constants for sizing, spacing, layout, transitions, and styling presets.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Detects preview mode and safely encodes/decodes category IDs for URLs.
frontend/src/lib/userProfileStorage.ts: Manages guest profile persistence in localStorage with migration support for older formats.
frontend/src/lib/userStoriesStorage.ts: Stores and prunes expiring guest story drafts in localStorage with add and delete helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, Internet Identity provider, and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx: Renders the About Us page with basic description and navigation back button.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesTab.tsx: Displays filtered categories with cover images and navigation, handling encoded category IDs.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryDetail.tsx: Loads stories for a given category ID, handling invalid IDs and showing up to 10 items.
frontend/src/pages/FavoritesTab.tsx: Displays the user's favorite stories with loading placeholders and an empty state message when none exist.
frontend/src/pages/GoPremium.tsx: Shows premium subscription plans, benefits, and handles simulated subscription flow before navigating to the success page.
frontend/src/pages/HelpAndSupport.tsx: Provides troubleshooting tips, contact info, social links, and a small credits section within a legal/support layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomeTab.tsx: Renders the home screen with featured stories, latest stories, ads, notifications, and language/theme controls.
frontend/src/pages/MyStories.tsx: Allows users to view and create story drafts, showing loading skeletons and an empty state when no drafts exist.
frontend/src/pages/PremiumSuccess.tsx: Displays a confirmation screen after successful subscription with a benefits list and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicy.tsx: Shows the app's privacy policy detailing data collection, ads, children's policy, and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileTab.tsx: User profile page with editing, authentication handling, navigation safety, and listing of user's story drafts and stats.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Search interface that filters and sorts all stories based on user query and language.
frontend/src/pages/StoryEditor.tsx: Story creation form supporting text, emojis, image upload, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/StoryReader.tsx: Story reading view with offline downloads, likes, comments, sharing, progress tracking, and customizable reading settings.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditions.ts: Static legal page displaying terms of use and contact details.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Service worker registration logic with preview-mode bypass, update handling, cache clearing, and auto-refresh.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors via CSS variables, safelisted utility classes, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the Stories app requirements, existing features, architectural notes, known issues, and image needs for ongoing build fixes.
